nodes.bodyText: kill --> stop/shutdown the admin and manged sever in the domain by changing the StartupPolicy to NEVER
Delete the Order annotation from all methods if we do not need Order in the class
Make sure the Rolling Restart and Operator Restart has been occurring simultaneously.

commit.message: fix logic to wait for rolling restart to start in existing test

nodes.bodyText:
In CommonTestUtils.java, we have a similar test method:
public static void checkPodReadyAndServiceExists(String podName, String domainUid, String namespace)
you can just call checkPodDoesNotExist(podName, null, namespace)

nodes.bodyText:
Same issue as previous comment.  Also, the error message is exactly the same as the previous one.  It might be better to include the filename in the log message so you know which file is failing.
This logger format is incorrect. If you are using this method
public void info(String msg, Object... params)
then the code should be
logger.info("Exception while copying file to pod {0}", ioex.getMessage())
or if you are using this method
public void info(String msg, Throwable thrown)
then the code should be
logger.info("Exception while copying file to pod", ioex)

This logger format is incorrect. If you are using this method
